alert.note: Alert for Inland Broward County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metro Broward County; Metropolitan Miami Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 4:32PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Miami-Dade and south central Broward Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 431 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm near Weston, or near Pembroke Pines, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pembroke Pines, Miramar, Davie, Plantation, Sunrise, Miami Gardens, Weston, Cooper City, Sawgrass Mills Mall, Royal Palm Ranches, Palm Springs North, Sunshine Acres, Intersection I-75 And U.S. 27, Intersection I-75 And Griffin Road, Country Club, Intersection Krome And U.S. 27, East Toll Gate On Alligator Alley and Markham Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Inland Broward County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metro Broward County; Metropolitan Miami Dade
